select_diagnosis:
Please select the diagnosis you want to do.
we will prepare it for you.
before_proceed: Before taking a picture, please take the Otoscope and make sure it is properly directed.
make_sure: Make sure the image is clear and has a perfect position. Please take the picture again if it is not clear.
please_wait:
Please Wait a Moment,
we are preparing it for you.
diagnosis_note: Note: If the diagnosis result is considered incorrect, please correct the result.
correction_hint: To correct the previous diagnosis result, please select the following label that is considered appropriate for the patient's illness and provide a clear reason.
diagnosis_complete_hint: Diagnosis has been successfully carried out. The diagnosis result can be accessed again in the patient history menu.
diagnosis_queue_complete_hint:
Thank you for your hard work. Today, all patients have been examined.
You can review the diagnoses in the medical records menu.
name: name
system_update_description: Our latest system version offers improved performance and security. Please ensure you update to the latest version for the best experience.
system_language_description: Select your preferred language for the system interface.
dongle_network_description: Please ensure your dongle is connected and your network is stable for the best experience.
realtime_gps_description: Please ensure your GPS is enabled for the best experience.
medical_record_edit_title: Ensure the Patient Data is Correct
medical_record_edit_hint:
Please ensure the patient data displayed above is correct!
If the data is incorrect, please go back to select the correct data.
